raw_text: VIOLET FERNANDO (Former Secretary – Civil Service (SLAS) – Beloved wife of late Leonard,​ loving mother of Anura,​ Ranuka,​ Dr Charitha,​ Sanjeewa and late Samantha,​ sister of Padmalatha and in-law of Bandu and Swarnamali,​ aunt of Gayan,​ Jayantha,​ Rohan,​ Nimali and Dilrukshi,​ Chrishanthi,​ Nilanthi,​ Manjula and Uresha,​ caring mother-in-law of Thilanka and Kavitha. Remains lie at Jayarathna Funeral Parlour (Baseline Road) from 8.00 a.m. on Tuesday. Funeral Service and Cremation will be held on 3rd July at 5.00 p.m. at General Cemetery,​ Borella.047489
